summary:
(ENG) • Biologist with the fortune to have been able to lead several researches, that with the help of my colleagues we could teared a tiny part of what remains to be discovered. Working in epigenetic and genetic 🧬 experiments with plants and animals. Being also very lucky to have been able to help and learn from great professionals in animal physiology and vascular plant researches.

• As well a basketball player 🏀. Sport that since I was a child have instilled in me numerous values both on and off the court. And that gave me the opportunity to live for five years in numerous states in the U.S. ✈️. Always hand in hand with the study of what I am passionate about, science.

• Looking for new challenges and goals 🏁 that help me learn and grow as a person.

——————————————————————————————

(ES) • Biólogo con la suerte de haber podido dirigir varias investigaciones, que junto con la ayuda de mis compañeros, hemos podido rasgar una ínfima parte de lo que aún queda por descubrir. Trabajando en experimentos epigenéticos y genéticos 🧬 con plantas y animales. Siendo también muy afortunado de haber podido ayudar y aprender de grandes profesionales en investigaciones en fisiología animal y plantas vasculares.

• A la par de jugador de baloncesto 🏀. Deporte que desde niño me ha inculcado numerosos valores tanto dentro como fuera de la pista. Y el cual me dio la oportunidad de poder vivir durante cinco años en varios estados de EE.UU ✈️. Siempre de la mano del estudio de lo que me apasiona, la ciencia.

• En búsqueda de nuevos retos y metas 🏁 que me ayuden a aprender y crecer como persona.
headline: MSc Medical Affairs & MSL | (Epi)genetic Investigator | Biologist

publications.description:
Participation as Research Assistant, in charge of:
• Geolocation and sample collection.
• Statistical analysis.
publications.name: Phenotypic variation of life‐history traits in native, invasive, and landrace populations of Brassica tournefortii
Population epi(genetic) variation in an anthropogenic spider
publications.description:
Participation as Principal Investigator, in charge of:
• Creation and planning of the project.
• Location and collection of specimens.
• DNA extraction, isolation, quantification and purification.
• PCR.
• Gel electrophoresis.
• Primer and restriction enzyme selection using ApE software for ITS and ISSR markers. 
• MSAP to detect epigenetic methylation sites.
- Analytical study of methylated genes using genetic markers (EcoRi, Msp I and Hpa II).
- Data processing to verify the initial hypothesis of the research and make corrections when necessary.
• RFLP to create a reference phylogeny.
• Statistical analysis and creation of graphs using R-Studio, ANOVA and Excel.
• Writing of the article and preparation of the presentation of the results.
publications.publisher: Under review by the journal Ecology and Evolution.

publications.name: Modifying gap junctions in planarians affects regeneration
publications.description:
Participation as Principal Investigator, in charge of:
• Creation and planning of the project.
• Selection of chemical reagents and their subsequent solutions.
• Measurement of the modified phenotypic changes on a weekly basis.
• Analytical and statistical study using R-Studio and Excel.
• Writing of the article and creation of graphs with the results of the research.
publications.publisher: Under review by the journal Ecology and Evolution.

publications.name: Evolution of the southeastern Pennsylvania Pholcus spider population through  DNA duplication
publications.description:
Participation as Principal Investigator, in charge of:
• Experiment design and planning.
• Statistical analysis and creation of graphs using R-Studio, ANOVA and Excel.
• Writing of the article and preparation of the presentation of the results.

publications.name: Phenotypic variation of sunflower to pH and epigenetic modifiers
publications.description:
Participation as Research Assistant, in charge of:
• From collection in the wild.
• Planning of the experiment.
• Application of treatments and taking phenotypic measurements.
• Statistical and qualitative analysis.

message.text:
Muy enriquecedora e interesante la jornada del pasado sábado con Juan Carrión, Presidente de FEDER ONG, y con Daniel de Vicente, Presidente de la Asociación de Pacientes ASMD España, que compartieron la importancia de la unión y el trabajo cross funcional en el sector de la salud.

Gracias también a Cristina Bando por habernos invitado, estudiantes de otros másteres, a esta conferencia.

Sabéis que tengo verdadera pasión por la formación y es una satisfacción dirigir el #Programa Superior de #MarketAccess de CESIF  que ayer terminó la VI edición. En la sesión de clausura tuvimos el placer de escuchar a @Juan Carrión - Presidente de FEDER ONG  y le acompaño Daniel de Vicente  - Presidente Asociación de Pacientes ASMD España . Su factor humano nos hizo a todos vibrar y reforzar la clave de trabajar de forma conjunta con todos los stakeholders. 
Quiero aprovechar para dar las gracias al magnífico claustro de profesores que me ha acompañado durante estos meses y a los alumnos que me han transmitido tanto, siempre digo que el enriquecimiento y aprendizaje es mutuo.
Ana Montesinos Llorca Gonzalo Freire Alba María Tirado Rodríguez Marta García Pérez Ana Marco Ortuño Goretti Hidalgo Zan José María Gómez Portolés Ruth Francisco 
Gracias a Carlos Redel Acosta y Lola Salcedo Moreno de CESIF  por la confianza
¡Me alegra contaros que he obtenido un nuevo certificado: Insignia de Competencia en Informática de Canvas Credentials (Badgr)!
